name: BookFlow Pro
description: Advanced booking system with calendar sync, automated reminders, and payment processing. Perfect for salons and service businesses.
features: Real-time calendar management with drag-and-drop interface
Multi-location booking support with location-specific availability
Automated SMS & email reminders (24h, 2h, and custom intervals)

Staff scheduling with individual calendars and availability rules

Customer profile system with booking history and preferences

Wait list management with automatic notifications
Industry presets for barbers, salons, fitness, medical, and consulting
Cancellation and rescheduling with configurable policies
Staff performance metrics and utilization rates
Customer retention and lifetime value analysis
Dynamic pricing rules based on time, staff, or demand
pricing: Starting at ¬£29/month - includes up to 100 bookings

Speed-optimized static storefronts for sub-1s load times
